title: Please Google, bring back the screenshot by long pressing the power button.
content: Google, please take note that having the ability to take a screenshot by long pressing the power button was VERY beneficial & easier than the now "power button/volume down" ability. That is very much going backwards in efficiency. I think Google would know this if they read the online forums & the concerns of Pixel users. That long pressing ability was one of the best things about Pixels.
